title: Looking for Master Elo + Jungler to Join a competitive organisation
body:
Tyrant Esports is trialing and recruiting a talented Jungler looking to make OCS/OPL. 

Tyrant is an organisation that currently owns the strongest DOTA2 team in Australia, and is looking to branch out into other Esport Scenes. The current roster has been scouted and hand picked over the last couple of weeks and only lacks a talented, competitive jungler. 

Requirements
- Previously/Currently master Elo +
- Looking to go pro and improve as a player
- Strong communication
- Ability to work around training schedules 
- Reflective, open and always looking to improve

If you fulfill all these requirements, and are looking to break into the competitive OCE scene, then Add "Glacial" (Team coach)  in game to set up a trial.
